name: Care Buddy
description:
Care Buddy is a game to promote care for others, self-care, and neurodivergence awareness. In order to care for others, we must also care for ourselves, you can log daily activity in your Journal. Keep your buddy taken care of, and take care of yourself to unlock cool stuff and buy it in the Store.

Art - Clair

Devs - Mel, Alyssa, and Marie
